tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crime_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR(255),
    date TIMESTAMP,
    crime_type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    arrest BOOLEAN,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SuspectInfo (
    suspect_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT,
    report_id UUID REFERENCES CrimeReports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50),
  report_description TEXT,
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  officer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE crimes (
    crime_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date TIMESTAMP,
    suspect_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    suspect_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE investigators (
    investigator_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    badge_number VARCHAR(20),
    department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE agencies (
    agency_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_id INT REFERENCES crimes(crime_id),
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)
